title: Secret World Legends
notes: Crashes on launch, and the error reporting tool appears instead of the launcher.

title: Secret World Legends
notes:
Game requires vcrun2015 and d3dcompiler_43 or won't event start.
installed them with
WINEPREFIX=/home/[my username]/.steam/steamsteamapps/compatdata/587620/pfx winetricks vcrun2015
WINEPREFIX=/home/[my username]/.steam/steamsteamapps/compatdata/587620/pfx winetricks -q d3dcompiler_43
After that game client works just fine, but trying to run the game proper in DX11 mode crashed on start. In DX9 mode the game warns about outdated drivers but otherwise manages to start, but after logging in the game che character selection screen is black and the game just freezes after loading

title: Secret World Legends
notes:
To make it run, run in the command line: 

WINEPREFIX=/home/[Your Username]/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/215280/pfx winetricks d3dx9_43
WINEPREFIX=/home/[Your Username]/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/215280/pfx winetricks vcrun2015
WINEPREFIX=/home/[Your Username]/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/215280/pfx winetricks -q d3dcompiler_43

The numbered folder might be different for each install, so yours might be different. I found the correct folder by checking the runprocess_log.txt file located in the "/drive_c/user/steamuser/My Documents/" folder under the pfx folder.

Performance is slightly lower than in Windows, and has a few graphical glitches with the shaders, but nothing game breaking so far (have played through the tutorial, and arrived in Kingsmouth).

title: Secret World Legends
notes:
Need to use winetricks to install d3dcompiler_43 and d3dx9_43 or the launcher will not start. 
dx9 version was playable with graphical glitches
dx11 crashes on load
winetricks vcrun2015, d3dx9_43, and d3dx11_43 needed for launcher to start
title: Secret World Legends

notes:
d3dx9_43 d3dx11_43 d3dcompiler_43 have to be installed with winetricks or protontricks
vcrun2015 was already included in this proton version
